terms: *Adopted by the Board of Directors on [[Date 1]] and approved by the Company’s stockholders on [[Date 4: Date]].*

*Further Amended by the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors on [[Date 6: Date]] and approved by the Company’s stockholders on [[Date 3]].*
